Join Us

New Recruitment Demo Days

If you're interested in joining Pale Kai as a inexperienced paddler for 2017, then come to our New Recruitment Demo Days at Coleman Park in Morro Bay during febuarary. These recruitment demo days are by sign up only! Novice recruitment for 2017 will close during the second week of March. So sign up now!


Reserve Your Spot

The new recruit demo days of 2017 are scheduled as follows, in Morro Bay (Coleman Park):

SUNDAY, February 5th 8:00 and 10:00 a.m.
SUNDAY, February 12th 08:00 and 10:00 a.m.
SUNDAY, February 19th 08:00 and 10:00 a.m.

Novice Training and Races

In March, practice will be held in Avila 3 times a week. During these practices you will build strength and endurance, learn paddeling technique, and train for race season.

Novice teams are built by the coach and compete in the Novice Devision of Scora's 2017 Iron Race Season.

Membership Dues

Every member of Pale Kai pays yearly dues in the amount of $350. This money goes towards the cost of maintaining our outriggers and club site, race fees, and insurance. Once paid, you will be considered a current 2017 Pale Kai member, with paddeling opportunites through out the year.

Required Waivers and Literature

The following waivers and are required to join Pale Kai. Please review supporting documentation as well.

  • SCORA 2017 Liability Waiver
  • PKO Safety Policy
  • PKO ByLaws
  • PKO Membership and Dues Policy
  • Paddling Manual
